owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

auto_trigger_checks.description: Enables or disables automatic creation of CheckSuite events upon pushes to the repository. Enabled by default.

setting.description: Set to `true` to enable automatic creation of CheckSuite events upon pushes to the repository, or `false` to disable them.
